name: ItemFrameEntityHelper
description: The `ItemFrameEntityHelper` class provides specialized access to Minecraft item frame entities, including both regular item frames and glow item frames.
overview:
This helper extends the base `EntityHelper` class and adds specific functionality for interacting with the item displayed in the frame, its rotation, and whether it's a glowing variant.

Item frames are decorative entities that can display items on their faces, commonly used for storage, decoration, or redstone contraptions. This helper allows you to inspect and manipulate item frames in your scripts.

methods.name: isGlowingFrame
methods.description: Checks if the item frame is a glowing variant.

methods.name: getRotation
methods.description: Returns the current rotation of the item displayed in the frame (0-7, representing 45-degree increments).

methods.name: getItem
methods.description: Returns an `ItemStackHelper` representing the item currently displayed in the item frame. Returns an empty `ItemStackHelper` if the frame is empty.
